scenarios.name: Create business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 name = MarkConsulting slug = mark-consulting-uc2 status = active timezone = America/New_York

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 name = MarkOffice slug = mark-office timezone = America/New_York status = active

scenarios.name: Create user identity for host
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_mark_uc2 email = mark.uc2@example.com name = MarkJohnson status = active

scenarios.name: Create host resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_mark_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 location_id = loc_uc2 type = host name = MarkHost slug = mark-host timezone = America/New_York host_user_id = usr_mark_uc2 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false max_simultaneous_bookings = 1 buffer_before_minutes = 15 buffer_after_minutes = 15

scenarios.name: Create calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 name = MarkCalendar timezone = America/New_York slot_duration_min = 30 slot_interval_min = 30 pre_buffer_min = 15 post_buffer_min = 15 min_advance_booking_hours = 12 max_advance_booking_days = 90 status = active

scenarios.name: Bind resource to calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_bindings id = cb_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 calendar_id = cal_uc2 owner_type = resource resource_id = res_mark_uc2 owner_ref_key = "resource:res_mark_uc2" is_primary = true is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create recurring availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_mon_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 calendar_id = cal_uc2 name = weekday_hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 1 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 18:00:00 action = available is_active = true priority = 100

scenarios.name: Create offer shell
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 name = VariableConsultation slug = variable-consultation execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/New_York

scenarios.name: Create flexible offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_uc2 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 offer_id = ofr_uc2 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = flexible default_duration_min = 60 min_duration_min = 30 max_duration_min = 240 duration_step_min = 30 base_price_minor = 10000 currency = USD pricing_model = {"unit_price_minor":10000}

scenarios.name: Create booking order
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_orders id = bo_uc2_001 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 offer_id = ofr_uc2 offer_version_id = ov_uc2 status = draft currency = USD subtotal_minor = 25000 total_minor = 25000 requested_start_at = 2026-02-26T10:00:00Z requested_end_at = 2026-02-26T12:30:00Z

scenarios.name: Create order line
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_order_lines id = bol_uc2_001 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 booking_order_id = bo_uc2_001 line_type = offer_base label = VariableConsulting quantity = 1 unit_amount_minor = 25000 line_total_minor = 25000

scenarios.name: Confirm booking and create unit
scenarios.prompt: update booking_orders set status = confirmed confirmed_start_at = 2026-02-26T10:00:00Z confirmed_end_at = 2026-02-26T12:30:00Z where id = bo_uc2_001 and biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2

scenarios.name: Create fulfillment unit
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_units id = fu_uc2_001 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 booking_order_id = bo_uc2_001 kind = service_task status = planned planned_start_at = 2026-02-26T10:00:00Z planned_end_at = 2026-02-26T12:30:00Z

scenarios.name: Assign host
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_assignments id = fa_uc2_001 biz_id = biz_consultant_var_uc2 fulfillment_unit_id = fu_uc2_001 resource_id = res_mark_uc2 status = confirmed starts_at = 2026-02-26T10:00:00Z ends_at = 2026-02-26T12:30:00Z
